description: Grafana Dashboard for Veeam Backup & Replication REST API.

targets.query:
from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "veeam_vbr_sessions")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "veeamVBRSessionsJobResult")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_value"] == 1) 
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["veeamVBRSessionJobName"] =~ /${vbrjobs:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["veeamVBR"] =~ /${vbrserver:regex}/)
  |> window(every: 24h)
  |> count() 
  |> group()

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "veeam_vbr_sessions")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "veeamVBRSessionsJobResult")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_value"] == 2) 
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["veeamVBRSessionJobName"] =~ /${vbrjobs:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["veeamVBR"] =~ /${vbrserver:regex}/)
  |> window(every: 24h)
  |> count() 
  |> group()

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "veeam_vbr_sessions")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "veeamVBRSessionsJobResult")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_value"] == 3) 
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["veeamVBRSessionJobName"] =~ /${vbrjobs:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["veeamVBR"] =~ /${vbrserver:regex}/)
  |> window(every: 24h)
  |> count() 
  |> group()

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "veeam_vbr_sessions")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "veeamVBRSessionsJobResult" )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["veeamVBRSessionJobName"] =~ /${vbrjobs:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["veeamVBR"] =~ /${vbrserver:regex}/)
  |> group(columns: ["veeamVBRSessionJobName"])

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "veeam_vbr_sessions")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "veeamBackupSessionsTimeDuration")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["veeamVBRSessionJobName"] =~ /${vbrjobs:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["veeamVBR"] =~ /${vbrserver:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_value"] > 0) // exclude negative values
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_value"] <= 86400) // exclude values greater than 86400 seconds
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "veeam_vbr_sessions")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "veeamVBRSessionsJobResult")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["veeamVBRSessionJobName"] =~ /${vbrjobs:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["veeamVBR"] =~ /${vbrserver:regex}/)
  |> group()
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "veeam_vbr_managedservers")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["veeamVBRMSName"] =~ /${vbrmanaged:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "veeamVBRMSInternalID")
  |> group(columns: ["veeamVBRMSName"])
  |> last()

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "veeam_vbr_proxies")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["veeamVBRProxyName"] =~ /${vbrproxies:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "veeamVBRProxyTask")
  |> group(columns: ["veeamVBRProxyName"])
  |> last()

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "veeam_vbr_repositories")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["veeamVBRRepoName"] =~ /${vbrrepositories:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "veeamVBRRepoCapacity" or r["_field"] == "veeamVBRRepoFree")
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      _time: r._time,
      veeamVBRRepoName: r.veeamVBRRepoName,
      _value: if r.veeamVBRRepoCapacity > 0 then 
                ((r.veeamVBRRepoCapacity - r.veeamVBRRepoFree) / r.veeamVBRRepoCapacity * 100.0)
              else 0.0 
  }))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value > 0)  
  |> group(columns: ["veeamVBRRepoName", "_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "veeam_vbr_repositories")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["veeamVBRRepoName"] =~ /${vbrrepositories:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "veeamVBRRepoCapacity" or r["_field"] == "veeamVBRRepoFree" or r["_field"] == "veeamVBRRepoUsed")
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      _time: r._time,
      veeamVBRRepoName: r.veeamVBRRepoName,
      conditionMet: (r.veeamVBRRepoFree == 0.0 or r.veeamVBRRepoCapacity == 0.0) and r.veeamVBRRepoUsed > 0.0,
      _value: r.veeamVBRRepoUsed // Assuming you need to maintain some value for context.
  }))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.conditionMet)
  |> group(columns: ["veeamVBRRepoName"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "veeam_vbr_repositories")
  |> last()
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> group(columns: ["veeamVBRRepoName"])

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "veeam_vbr_backupobjects")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "restorePointsCount")
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["veeamVBRBobjectName"] =~ /${vbrprotected:regex}/)
  |> group(columns: ["veeamVBRBobjectName"])
  |> last()
  |> yield(name: "last")

list.definition:
from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "veeam_vbr_info")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["veeamVBR"] != "")
  |> keep(columns: ["veeamVBR"])
  |> distinct(column: "veeamVBR")
  |> group()
list.label: Veeam Backup Server
list.name: vbrserver
list.query:
from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "veeam_vbr_info")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["veeamVBR"] != "")
  |> keep(columns: ["veeamVBR"])
  |> distinct(column: "veeamVBR")
  |> group()

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "veeam_vbr_sessions")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["veeamVBRSessionJobName"] != "")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["veeamVBR"] == "${vbrserver}")
  |> keep(columns: ["veeamVBRSessionJobName"])
  |> distinct(column: "veeamVBRSessionJobName")
  |> group()
list.label: Jobs
list.name: vbrjobs
